TRADE.PRIVATE_TRADE_TOOLTIP: This trade would be yours. And only can be found if the direct link is sent to it.
TRADE.NOT_FOUND_TRADES: Looks like you did not trade yet. Start, it's easy! :)
TRADE.TOOLTIP_AVAILABILITY: You can define the availability of the trade until a specific time.
TRADE.TOOLTIP_CREATED: Displays when the trade was created
TRADE.SB_LIST_TRADES: Seller/Buyer, indicates which addreses are the users that created the trades.
